ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] PvP Servers
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope....just your coinage and 1 item that you have equipped.  At least as far as I know. It all depends on what kind of character you make that ll get you
ygData.messageBody:
Nope....just your coinage and 1 item that you have equipped. At least as
far as I know.

It all depends on what kind of character you make that'll get you pked. I
made an ogre, and I just had my first time of getting ganged by 2 trolls
that were red to me, and I'm 11th level. Human area? LOTS of pking and
corpses. I hear the same w/ the elven areas.




"IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield" <persona@...> on 04/03/2001 02:16:50
PM

Subject: [EverQuest] PvP Servers


Hrmm...since we are talking about PvP Servers...
I never have really given it a try...well because I kept getting knocked
silly by four level 2's inside the city.

Is the PK allowed to loot everything from the person he killed?
